item.description:
~~~HOLIDAY MIXER~~~

Meetup members, unwind from the daily grind with a cocktail and let your stress melt away on December 14th. Network in a relaxed, lounge setting - making valuable connections for the new year. Several other groups will be invited to this event so a big turnout is expected. This will be a classy event. No cover, just come ready to mingle.

Wednesday December 14, 2011
6pm to 9pm

FELT ULTRA LOUNGE - 533 Washington St. (Downtown Boston)

LIVE MUSIC | NETWORKING | DINING
Exchange ideas with like minded professionals & entrepreneurs

HOSTED BY:
BostonOffline.com, Night Life Executives LLC & Young Black Women's Society Inc.
Enjoy Complimentary Appetizers (6pm to 7pm)

(peer pressure time ;-)
Unless you absolutely have work/class/something ultraimportant at this time there is no excuse for not coming out and enjoying yourself. You've worked hard all year. You joined this meetup to...meet up so let's do it.
You never know who you will meet.

Felt Lounge is conveniently located near the Orange, Red, and Green line and has validated parking for only $10 all night at 1 De Lafayette Avenue
item.name: The After Work Series/ Cocktails & Connections: Holiday Edition Mixer
